Pre-Game Insights: The Twins are favored with -187 moneyline odds, while the Blue Jays are underdogs at +156. The Twins also have a run-line favorite of -1.5 and an over/under of 7.5 runs expected to be scored in the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is taking place at Target Field in Minneapolis, Minnesota, and will be broadcast on SNET. The Twins have a strong recent performance as favorites, winning 61.1% of their games this season when favored. The Blue Jays have a 35.4% win rate when named underdogs this season and have won all four of their games as +156 underdogs.
Others: The Twins have a 3-7-0 record against the spread in their last 10 games, while the Blue Jays have a 5-5-0 ATS record in their last 10 games. The Twins have a team ERA of 4.25 and a K/9 of 8.9, while the Blue Jays have an ERA of 2.38 and a K/9 of 9.9.
